traits.appearance: wears distinctive jewelry: earrings, necklace, circlet, bracelets
traits.abilities: is studious, learned, and inquisitive, but is dull and boring

personality.mannerism: Brings up anecdotal backstory as examples to conversation Eg. 'Hey that reminds me of the time I-'
personality.interaction: is always honest with the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Slowly, at a High pitch.
